text: Mbe Pita nzuav warir nzaim, mba kameŋ vov Herotan hɨgim, Herot kaŋgi, Pita mbu bɨnan ki fhu. Ana mbaram gumgi mbari ga sarigim, mbe vov Pita ndi gari. Mbe vov Pita ndi garav, mbe ana gangi fhu. Herot mbaram mba bɨnan Pita gangi gɨɨtɨvi, ana kama havharar khaŋ mbe nzuai, “Gu mbe shogirim, mbe vhɨzgirga.” Herot maaŋ muuŋgiap ana zumgum Zudia thav khavgiap, verav, Sisarian vergap anan ki.
